summary: Jimmy attempted a 30-day fast without food to push his body to the extreme. Doctors monitored his health as he struggled with hunger, tempting food offers from friends, and declining energy levels. On day 14, he broke the fast, ate Gordon Ramsay’s dish, and had his head shaved as per the challenge.

title: I Didn’t Eat Food For 30 Days
description:
This was one of my hardest videos. I went as long as possible not eating any food.

New Chocolate - https://feastables.com/

Check out Viewstats! - https://www.viewstats.com/
